title: AP, Big Ben, Gronk lead '27 HOF 1st-time eligibles

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: AP, Big Ben, Gronk lead '27 HOF 1st-time eligibles
sources.description: The first-ballot headliners for the Pro Football Hall of Fame's Class of 2027 include running back Adrian Peterson, quarterback Ben Roethlisberger and tight end Rob Gronkowski. Each of those players played their last season in 2021.
